tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE curriculum_content (
  content_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  author VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  content_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  lesson_plan TEXT,
  educational_materials BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE curriculum_content (
    content_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    content_title TEXT NOT NULL,
    content_type TEXT,
    content_description TEXT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE lesson_plans (
    plan_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_title TEXT NOT NULL,
    plan_description TEXT,
    course_id INT,
    lesson_order INT,
    plan_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE curriculum_content (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  content_url TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE courses (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    course_code VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    course_title TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE lesson_plans (
  plan_id int PRIMARY KEY,
  plan_title varchar,
  plan_description text,
  plan_grade_level varchar,
  plan_subject varchar,
  plan_steps jsonb
);

CREATE TABLE ar_courses (
  course_id int PRIMARY KEY,
  course_title varchar,
  course_description text,
  course_duration int,
  course_level varchar
);

CREATE TABLE course_materials (
  course_id int,
  material_id int,
  PRIMARY KEY (course_id, material_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES ar_courses(course_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES educational_materials(material_id)
);
